About Me

I'm an aspiring Front-End Developer

Kathy Dunning

I'm an aspiring Front-End Developer with a pssion for continuous learning! I have completed a few online courses on udemy, and I am working on a few more. I am feeling a lot more comfortable with HTML 5, CSS3, SCSS, Sass, Git, Node.js, npm, Javascript, and much more.
I am enjoying the learning process, and hope to jump back in the work force soon.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy spending time with my family, watching and playing basketball, hiking, biking, playing all sorts of sports, listening to music, playing board games, and much more.
